productRules.description: Cameos are not allowed on 6x6 size
Debossing is not allowed on either cover if both are combo covers
Debossing is not allowed on the front if the front is a combo cover
Disable the combo_cover category UNLESS cover_combo is chosen as the cover type
When non-combo covers are chosen, make cover_material required
When combo covers are chosen, make combo subcategories required, disable cameos
Blind debossing is not allowed with Quicksand font (front)
Blind debossing is not allowed with Quicksand font (back)
Foil debossing colors are not allowed with Oswald font (front)
Foil debossing colors are not allowed with Oswald font (back)
Make all debossing subcategories required when debossing is enabled (front)
Make all debossing subcategories required when debossing is enabled (back)
Debossing is not allowed on padded covers
Oswald debossing font is not allowed on silk or fabric materials
Oswald debossing font is not allowed on silk or fabric spine materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors are not allowed on the very dark premium leather materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors are not allowed on the very dark premium leather spine materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors (including blind) are not allowed on the lighter-shade premium leather materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors (including blind) are not allowed on the lighter-shade premium leather spine materials
No debossing is allowed on linen, floral fabric, or black alligator leather materials
No debossing is allowed on linen, floral fabric, or black alligator leather spine materials
